author: Andrea Buttier
description: Andrea created this drink "for enjoying the flavour of smoky whisky with calvados adding to apple fruitiness." The amount of Peychaud's used makes or breaks this drink so beware of how generous your 'dash' is.
name: Smokey Boat
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
